Name: Jäger Old-Fashioned
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish, along with skewered cherry.
Review: Rewarding, chocolaty and boozy with complex herbal and fruity notes.
History: Created in 2017 by Florian Beuren , Jägermeister's UK brand ambassador. For a more detailed history of the Old-Fashioned cocktail , along with additional recipes, see our page.
Nutrition: One serving of Jäger Old-Fashioned contains 171 calories
